alert.note: Alert for Towner (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 11:00AM CDT until May 08 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of northeast North Dakota, including the following counties, Benson, Cavalier, Nelson, Ramsey, Towner and Walsh. * WHEN...Until 600 PM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1100 AM CDT, local law enforcement reported ongoing flooding across the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Cando, Munich, Edmore, Adams, Bisbee, Starkweather, Rocklake, Lankin, Dahlen, Brocket, Hampden, Webster, Clyde, Fairdale, Alsen, Wales, Lawton, Egeland, Sarles and Calio.
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
